review: Everything works and functions as advertised - except the battery cover on the remote. Pushing on the rectangle on the back did not release the cover to slide it off.  None the help responses from Amazon were any help. I had to search online for others who had this same problem (there were many) to get advise. I found that others had resorted to sliding a knife in the Crack to push on the tab to release it. This is how I had to resort to to get the cover off.  I EXPECTED BETTER QUALITY CONTROL FROM AMAZON.
author: Larry Augustus
